info.title: Blockvision Monad Testnet API
info.description: API endpoints to retrieve tokens, NFTs, account activities, transactions, internal transactions, token activities, collection activities, token holders, native MON holders, and collection holders on the Monad Testnet.

get.description: Returns all tokens currently held by any given address on the Monad Testnet, including the native Monad coin and ERC-20 tokens.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve tokens for. Defaults to 0x7E57aCbF462f4dB265383463Ca05509F31fC5b0B.

200.description: A JSON object containing the account tokens.

get.description: Returns all non-fungible tokens currently held by any given address on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve NFTs for. Defaults to 0x290b7C691Ee1FB118120f43E1A24d68B45CB27FB.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index for paginated results. Returns a fixed number of 5 collections per page.

200.description: A JSON object containing the account NFTs.

get.description: Returns the historical activity of any address on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve historical activity for. Defaults to 0x581b1Dd14731EFE7986Db62E2A003E859147eD14.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of activities to return. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing account activities.

get.description: Returns all transactions of any given address on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve transactions for. Defaults to 0x290b7C691Ee1FB118120f43E1A24d68B45CB27FB.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of transactions to return. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing account transactions.

get.description: Returns all internal transactions of any given address on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve internal transactions for. Defaults to 0x290b7C691Ee1FB118120f43E1A24d68B45CB27FB.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter for internal transactions. Options: all, from, to. Defaults to 'all'.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of internal transactions to return. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing internal transactions.

get.description: Returns all activities of a given token contract on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve token activities for. Defaults to 0x290b7C691Ee1FB118120f43E1A24d68B45CB27FB.

parameters.name: tokenAddress
parameters.description: The token contract address. Defaults to 0x8f01C14F15966aE671035F1ED78334fC32a7AB6b.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of token activities to return. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing token activities.

get.description: Returns all activities of a given non-fungible token contract on the Monad Testnet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve collection activities for. Defaults to 0x290b7C691Ee1FB118120f43E1A24d68B45CB27FB.

parameters.name: collectionAddress
parameters.description: The NFT contract address. Defaults to 0x43D1CF839F5A39A63D90920d1A738697DDbE42bD.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of collection activities to return. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing collection activities.

get.description: Returns the token distribution of a given token contract on the Monad Testnet, including the addresses, amounts, and their percentage of the total supply.

parameters.name: contractAddress
parameters.description: The token contract address. Defaults to 0x760AfE86e5de5fa0Ee542fc7B7B713e1c5425701.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing token holders.

get.description: Returns the top 1000 MON holders, including the addresses, amounts, and their percentage of the total supply.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing MON holders.

get.description: Returns the NFT distribution of a given non-fungible token contract on the Monad Testnet, including the addresses, amounts, and their percentage of the total supply.

parameters.name: contractAddress
parameters.description: The NFT contract address. Defaults to 0xdd23adE69Fc2FE1934AA36C5aB12F6DC58a3446f.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default is 20 and maximum is 50.

200.description: A JSON object containing collection holders.
